---
title: "bargraphs_by_conf"
author: "Sophia"
date: "11/1/2023"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
merged_data %>%
  group_by(CONF) %>%
  summarize(AvgValue = mean(FTR)) %>%
  arrange(AvgValue) %>%
  mutate(CONF = factor(CONF, levels = CONF, ordered = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(CONF, AvgValue)) + geom_bar(stat = 'identity') + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 60, hjust = 1))
```
